name: NSFontDescriptor.FeatureKey
desc: Constants to use as keys to retrieve information about a font descriptor from its feature dictionary.

items.name: static let typeIdentifier: NSFontDescriptor.FeatureKey
items.desc: A key that indicates the type of the font feature.

items.name: static let selectorIdentifier: NSFontDescriptor.FeatureKey
items.desc: A key that indicates the selector of the font feature.
